content.question: In line 3, summa sequar fastigia rerum is translated

choices.label: the main points summarize the situation
summarize the points of the main situation
I will summarize the main points of the situation
let the main points of the situation be summarized

content.answer: I will summarize the main points of the situation

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
